skills.skill: College Degree in health, fitness, or recreation related field

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide a safe and effective exercise environment for club Members/Guests through supervision of exercise programs and education in exercise.
Establish personalized exercise programs for each Member/Guest, based on their fitness needs.
Promote the facility and the club, providing excellent service to Members and guests.
Conduct new Member FitStart appointments and track accordingly.
Maintain fitness-related certifications, actively seek new education opportunities, and update programming as needed.
Maintain a schedule of availability, ensure completion of daily assignments, and participate as a member of the team.
Notify supervisor of Member/Guest complaints and rectify any complaints as soon as possible.
Adhere to all company, club, and department written mandatory standards of operations, policies, and procedures.
Communicate effectively, work well under pressure, and focus attention on detail.
Maintain good conduct and safe working habits, ensuring all exercise areas and equipment are in safe and effective working condition.
Attendance at team and individual meetings, daily line-up, and club events as requested. Wearing a clean and neat uniform daily.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma, GED, or equivalent required. College Degree in health, fitness, or recreation related field preferred.
